title: Internal error handling, when service returns but the data is not distinguishable.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is on home screen or the order history screen
AND the service returns but the data is not distinguishable
custom_steps: WHEN the error message pops up
custom_expected:
THEN, a single button dialog message will be displayed to the user
AND the text will read: "Sorry there was an issue with trying to complete that request.  Please try again later."
AND an "OK" button is displayed
AND user can tap "OK" button to dismiss dialog

title: Internal error handling, when the service returns but he data is not in a good format, i.e order coming back with no status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is on the home screen or the order history screen
AND the service returns but the data is not in a good format, i.e. order coming back with no status
custom_steps: WHEN the error message pops up
custom_expected:
THEN, a single button dialog message will be displayed to the user
AND the text will read: "Sorry there was an issue with trying to complete that request.  Please try again later."
AND an "OK" button is displayed
AND user can tap "OK" button to dismiss dialog

title: Internal error handling, when the service returns but no error or data is displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is on the home screen or the order history 
AND the service returns no error or data
custom_steps: WHEN the error message pops up
custom_expected:
THEN, a single button dialog message will be displayed to the user
AND the text will read: "Sorry there was an issue with trying to complete that request.  Please try again later."
AND an "OK" button is displayed
AND user can tap "OK" button to dismiss dialog

title: User attempts to cancel order and the request could not be processed
custom_preconds: GIVEN, a user has placed an order and decides to cancel due to change of mind
custom_steps:
WHEN a user attempts to cancel the order and the request could not be processed
AND the error message pops up
custom_expected:
THEN, a two button notification dialog is displayed
AND the text reads "Could not process cancellation request. Try again?"
AND the user has the options to either cancel or try again

title: Network error and timeouts
custom_preconds: GIVEN, a user takes an action that results in making an http call (including navigating to a view)
custom_steps:
WHEN the http call result in a 404, 500, or other error that indicates the resource is unavailable
OR the app is unable to make the network request because network connectivity is disabled or unavailable on device
OR the app times out the http request
custom_expected:
THEN, a blocking dialog with the following text is displayed
-Header: "Network Error"
-Body: "There was a network error completing your request. Please try again later."
-Action button: "OK"; result = dismiss a notification, return a user to screen without any action taken.

title: Item no longer available error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN, a user is adding/editing cart or checkout
AND if an item is no longer available at the time of adding/editing cart or checkout
custom_steps: WHEN a user tries to submit order
custom_expected:
THEN, an error message displays which clearly indicates the user that the selected items/merchant is no longer available
AND the user is respectively returned to menu or search

title: Invalid payment instrument: Checkout error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN, a user is in the cart view
AND the user tries to pay with a known invalid payment instrument
AND the user tries to process the order
custom_steps: WHEN the error message pops up
custom_expected:
THEN, user sees an error message directing user to fix any incorrect information, or use a different payment instrument
AND the error is a double button notification
AND the text reads "Sorry, there was a problem with the {Card/Payment method} you selected
AND the user has the options to cancel or change payment
-Tapping cancel - dismisses prompt and return user to cart
-Tapping change payment - dismisses prompt and take user to payment method/cc entry view.

title: Checkout error due to order fail for unknown reason
custom_preconds: GIVEN, a user ready to checkout or process the order
custom_steps: WHEN the order fails on payment due to known reasons
custom_expected:
THEN, a 2 buttons error message will pop up
AND text reads "We're sorry, there was a problem processing your order."
AND a user has the option to either cancel or try again
"Cancel" - Dismisses prompt and takes user back to the cart at presubmission state
"Try again" - Attempts to post the order. Data call POST /orders/ {uuid} /send

title: The recurring payment could not be created but the first transaction was approved.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user attempts to pay with credit card
AND the credit card payment fails because the recurring payment could not be created but the first transaction was approved.
custom_steps: WHEN the error message pops up
custom_expected:
THEN, the error message is displayed directing user what to do next
AND the error reads “There was a temporary error processing your payment. Try Again?"
AND a user is given the options to either Retry or Cancel

title: Bad card check digit error
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the Cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user places the order
AND the send order fails due to a ‘Bad card check digit’
custom_expected:
THEN the string the user will see displayed on the UI will read as ‘Bad Card input'
"Sorry, there was a problem with your payment information. Please try re-entering your card information or choose another payment method."
"errors": ["Bad card check digit"]
 AND error status will be 422

title: Invalid card number Error
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the Cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user places the order
AND the send order fails due to a ‘Invalid card number’
custom_expected:
THEN the string the user will see displayed on the UI will read as ‘invalid card number'
“There was a problem with the card information you entered. Please try again.”
AND the error displaying in charles will read as: “ { "errors": ["Invalid card number”]}
AND error status will be 422

title: Wrong expiration Error
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the Cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user places the order
AND the send order fails due to a ‘Wrong expiration’
custom_expected:
THEN the string the user will see displayed on the UI will read as ‘Bad Card input'
“There was a problem with the card information you entered. Please try again.”
"errors": ["Wrong expiration"]
 AND error status will be 422

title: Generic Failure
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the Cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user places the order
AND the send order fails due to a generic issue
custom_expected:
THEN the string the user will see displayed on the UI will read as ‘Generic Failure'
"Sorry, we could not complete your request. Please try again later. "
"errors": ["Bad card check digit"]
 AND error status will be 422
